platform.name: Buildly Product Labs
platform.description: A comprehensive product management platform combining AI-powered assistance with traditional project management tools

primary_sections.name: Dashboard
primary_sections.description: Central command center with personalized overview

primary_sections.name: Product Portfolio
primary_sections.description: Manage all products in centralized location

primary_sections.name: Product Roadmap
primary_sections.description: Plan features and track development progress

primary_sections.name: Release Management
primary_sections.description: Plan, create, and track software releases

primary_sections.name: Insights & Analytics
primary_sections.description: Deep insights with analytics and AI recommendations

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your central command center providing personalized overview of products, tasks, and deadlines

key_features.name: Personalized Welcome
key_features.description: Time-based greeting with user profile information and role-based content
key_features.how_to_use: Automatically displayed after login
tips: Check dashboard daily for important updates
Use role-based views for focused content

key_features.name: Product Overview Cards
key_features.description: Visual cards showing accessible products with release progress
key_features.how_to_use: Click on product cards to navigate to product details
tips: Use cards for quick product switching

key_features.name: Task Management
key_features.description: Separate columns for assigned Issues and Features with priority indicators
key_features.how_to_use: View assigned tasks and click to open details

key_features.name: Release Timeline
key_features.description: Upcoming releases with due date warnings
key_features.how_to_use: Review upcoming deadlines and click for release details

product_portfolio.title: Product Portfolio
product_portfolio.description: Centralized management of all products with comprehensive tracking tools

key_features.name: Product Creation
key_features.description: Create new products with technical details and team setup
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'Add Product' and fill in basic information, technical details, and team setup
tips: Set up proper team permissions from the start

key_features.name: Product Cards Display
key_features.description: Visual grid layout with progress indicators and quick stats
key_features.how_to_use: Browse products in grid view, click cards for details
tips: Use search and filters for large portfolios

product_roadmap.title: Product Roadmap
product_roadmap.description: Plan features, track issues, and collaborate using Kanban or tabular views

key_features.name: Kanban Board View
key_features.description: Column-based organization with drag-and-drop functionality
key_features.how_to_use: Drag features between columns (To Do, In Progress, Testing, Done)
tips: Use visual workflow for quick status updates
Organize columns by your team's process

key_features.name: Tabular View
key_features.description: Detailed list with sorting, filtering, and export functionality
key_features.how_to_use: Use table headers to sort, apply filters, select items for bulk operations
tips: Use filters to focus on specific priorities

key_features.name: Feature Management
key_features.description: Complete feature lifecycle from creation to completion
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'Add Feature', fill form with title, description, priority, and assign to release

key_features.name: AI Feature Suggestions
key_features.description: AI-powered feature recommendations based on product context
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'Generate AI Suggestion', review suggestion, accept or generate another
tips: Customize AI suggestions to fit your needs

key_features.name: User Story Generation
key_features.description: AI creates user stories for features based on user types
key_features.how_to_use: In feature form, click 'Generate User Stories' after defining user types
tips: Ensure stories match your user personas

feature_suggestions.description: AI analyzes product context to suggest relevant features for product management workflows
feature_suggestions.output_format: JSON with suggested_feature, description, and rationale

user_stories.description: Automatically generate user stories following 'As a [user], I want [goal] so that [benefit]' format
triggers: Generate User Stories button in feature forms
user_stories.customization: Edit generated stories to match your personas

releases.title: Release Management
releases.description: Comprehensive release planning, creation, and tracking with AI assistance

key_features.name: Release Planning
key_features.description: Create releases with feature selection and timeline planning
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'Add Release', configure name, description, target date, and select features

key_features.name: AI Generate Release
key_features.description: AI analyzes unfinished features and creates optimized releases automatically
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'AI Generate Release', review suggested features and timeline, confirm or modify
tips: Adjust timeline based on team capacity

key_features.name: Release Tracking
key_features.description: Monitor progress with charts, feature status, and team assignments
key_features.how_to_use: Navigate to Release Details page for progress visualization and team tracking

key_features.name: Punchlist Management
key_features.description: Track final items needed before release completion
key_features.how_to_use: In Release Details, go to Punchlist tab, add items with severity and priority

release_generation.description: AI creates releases by analyzing unfinished features and optimizing for delivery
release_generation.algorithm: Prioritizes high-impact, ready features with realistic timelines
release_generation.output: Complete release with selected features, timeline, and recommendations

insights.title: Insights & Analytics
insights.description: Deep analytics with AI-powered recommendations and team assistance

key_features.name: Product Analytics
key_features.description: Comprehensive metrics on release performance, feature completion, and team productivity
key_features.how_to_use: Review charts and metrics regularly to identify trends and improvement opportunities

key_features.name: AI Feature Completion Predictions
key_features.description: AI predicts completion dates and identifies at-risk features
key_features.how_to_use: Review AI-generated estimates in release planning and feature details

key_features.name: AI Budget Estimation
key_features.description: Automatically estimate project costs with team size recommendations
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'AI Estimate' on releases for budget analysis

key_features.name: Team Assistance System
key_features.description: Intelligent detection of when products need additional team support
key_features.how_to_use: Click 'Request Team Help' when button appears, fill out assistance form
key_features.response_time: Buildly team reviews and responds within 24-48 hours

completion_predictions.description: Machine learning models predict feature completion dates based on historical patterns
completion_predictions.accuracy_improving: Models learn from your team's specific patterns over time

budget_estimation.description: AI analyzes project scope and provides cost estimates with team recommendations
budget_estimation.output_format: Detailed breakdown with role recommendations and cost ranges

ai_assistant.title: AI Assistant (Chatbot)
ai_assistant.description: Personal AI assistant for navigation, questions, and contextual guidance

key_features.name: Contextual Help
key_features.description: Page-specific guidance with dynamic suggestions and documentation links
key_features.how_to_use: Click floating AI button, choose from suggestions or ask questions

key_features.name: Smart Conversations
key_features.description: Natural language processing with project context understanding

key_features.name: Quick Access
key_features.description: Always available floating button with mobile-friendly interface

common_questions: How do I create a new product?
What's the difference between features and issues?
How do I invite team members?
Can you explain the release process?
How do I generate an AI feature suggestion?
How do I request team assistance?
What is a punchlist and how do I use it?

form_ai_helper.title: Form AI Helper
form_ai_helper.description: Smart assistance for form completion throughout the platform

supported_fields.description: Comprehensive release descriptions highlighting key features

how_to_use: Look for ✨ AI Helper icon next to form fields
Click the icon to get 3 AI-generated suggestions
Choose a suggestion or use as inspiration
Customize the content to fit your needs

steps.result: Understanding of current products and tasks

product_owner.description: Full access to product management features

developer.description: Focus on feature and issue tracking

product_setup: Start with clear goals and requirements
Set up team members and roles early
Create initial release for planning purposes
Use AI suggestions to jumpstart planning
feature_management: Break large features into smaller pieces

mobile_features.responsive_design: Full mobile optimization for all features
mobile_features.touch_interactions: Optimized for touch navigation and gestures
mobile_features.offline_capabilities: Limited offline viewing of cached data
